exec: INSERT INTO courthouse (cth_id, courthouse_name, display_name, created_ts, last_modified_ts)
INSERT INTO court_case (cas_id, cth_id, case_number, case_closed, interpreter_used)
INSERT INTO hearing (hea_id, cas_id, ctr_id, hearing_date, hearing_is_actual)
INSERT INTO media_request (mer_id, hea_id, requestor, request_status, request_type, start_ts, end_ts, created_ts, last_modified_ts)
